text: Hey <@U02J1440N13>, if you have a pro or enterprise subscription you should be able to use <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/associations-enhancements-beta#create-and-edit-association-labels-professional-and-enterprise-only|labeled associations> on your deal-to-contact associations, and then in the email action only send to the desired association label types. The feature is in public beta, and you can opt in in the Object settings page.
It should look something like this in the “Send email” workflow action

Ever read any best practices for workflow naming, organization, and structuring? As we've grown, so has teh quantity of workflows and it is starting to get a little unmanageable. We end up spending more time than I'd like to admit chasing down "how did that thing happen?". Any suggestions or writeups would be appreciated.
